manzils.text: tannalilninnu tanneyulla oru munnariyippukaran avarilekku vannatukaranam avar adbhutam kurukayan. annane satyanisedhikal parannu: "itu valare vismayakaramaya karyam tanne
nam mariccu mannaya sesam matannivarikayea? a matakkam asadhyam tanne
avarilninnu bhumi kuravu varuttikkeantirikkunnat nam arinnittunt. nam'mute vasam ellam suksmamayulla granthavumunt
ennal satyam vannettiyappeal avaratine tallipparannu. annane avar asayakkulappattilayi
tannalute miteyulla manatte avar neakkikkanunnille? ennaneyan namat nirmikkukayum alankarikkukayum ceytatenn? atilearu vitavumilla
bhumiyea; atine nam visalamakki viriccirikkunnu. namatil malakale urappiccu. ketukakarannalaya sakalayinam sasyannal mulappikkukayum ceytu
pascattapiccu matannunna dasanmarkk ulkkalcayum udbeadhanavum nalkanan iteakkeyum
manattuninnu nam anugrhitamaya mala peyyiccu. annane atuvali vividhayinam teattannalum keaytetukkan parrunna dhan'yannalum ulpadippiccu
nam'mute atimakalkk aharamayi. a malamulam mrtamaya natine jivas'surratakki. annanettanneyan uyirttelunnelp
avarkku mumpe nuhinre janatayum ras'sukarum thamud geatravum satyatte nisedhiccu
aikka nivasikalum tubba'inre janatayum atu tanne ceytu. avareakke daivadutanmare tallipparannu. annane enre munnariyipp avaril yatharthyamayi pularnnu
adya srstikaranam nam talarnnennea? alla; avar putiya srstippine sambandhicc sansayattilan
niscayamayum naman manusyane srsticcat. avanre manas's mantriccukeantirikkunnateakkeyum nam nannayariyunnu. avanre kanthanadiyekkal avaneat atuttavanan nam
valatu bhagattum itatu bhagattum irunn erruvannunna rantuper ellam erruvannunna karyam orkkuka
avaneateappam orunni nilkkunna niriksakarillate avanearu vakkum uccarikkunnilla
maranavepralam yatharthyamayi bhavikkunnu. ni tennimaran sramikkunnatentea atanit
ann ellavarum vannettum. nayicc keant varunnavanum saksiyum kuteyuntavum
ann avareat parayum: tirccayayum ni itekkuricc asrad'dhanayirunnu; ennal namippeal ninnilninn a mara etuttumarriyirikkunnu. atinal ninre kalca inn murccayeriyatatre
avanre kuteyulla malakk parayum: ita i karmapustakaman enre vasam tayyarullat
allahu kalpikkum: "satyanisedhiyum dhikkariyumaya evareyum ninnaliruvarum cernn narakattilituka
allahuveateappam vere daivannale kalpiccavaneyum. ninnalavane kathinasiksayilituka
avanre kuttaliyaya pisac parayum: nannalute natha! nanivane valipilappiccittilla. ennalivan svayam tanne valareyere valiketilayirunnu
allahu parayum: ninnal enre munnil vecc tarkkikkenta. nan nerattettanne ninnalkk takkit tannittunt
enre atutt vakk marramilla. nan enre dasanmareat ottum aniti kattunnatumalla
nam narakatteat ceadikkunna dinam: "ni nirannu kalinnea?" narakam tiriccu ceadikkum: "iniyumuntea
bhaktanmarkkayi svargam atuttukeantuvarum. ottum dureyallatta vidham
srastavilekk matannukayum suksmata pularttukayum ceyyunna evarkkum vagdanam ceyyappettatanit
athava, paramakarunikane neril kanatetanne bhayappetukayum pascattapa purnamaya manas'seate vannettukayum ceytavan
avarkkavite avaragrahikkunnateakke labhikkum. nam'mute vasam vereyum dharalamunt
avarkkumump etra talamurakaleyan nam nasippiccat. avar ivarekkal valareyere saktarayirunnu. annane avar nataya natukalileakke anvesiccuneakki. raksappetan valla itavum labhikkumeayenn
akasabhumikaleyum avaykkitayilullavayeyum nam aru nalukalilayi srsticcu. atukeanteannum namukkeattum ksinam badhiccittilla
atinal avar parayunnateakke ksamikkuka. suryeadayattinum astamayattinum mumpe ninre nathane valttuka. oppam kirttikkukayum ceyyuka
atuttearitattuninn viliccu parayunnavan vilambaram ceyyunna dinattinnayi katearkkuka
a ghearanadam oru yatharthyamayi avar kettanubhavikkum dinam. at purappatinre dinamatre
jivippikkunnatum marippikkunnatum naman. tiriccuvaravum nam'milekku tanne
bhumi pilarnn manusyar puratt katann ativegam otivarunna dinam. avvidham avare orumiccu kuttal namukk valare eluppaman
avar parannukeantirikkunnatinepparri nam nannayariyunnu. avarute mel nirbandham celuttenta avasyam ninakkilla. atinal enre takkit bhayappetunnavare ni i khur'an vali udbeadhippikkuka
ninnalkku vagdattam ceyyappetunna karyam satyam tanne; tircca
nervaliyil ninn akannavan i satyattil ninn vyaticalikkunnu
atea, avar narakagniyil eriyunna dinam tanne
ann avareat parayum: ita, ninnalkkulla siksa. it anubhaviccukealluka. ninnal titukkam katti avasyappettukeantirunnat itanallea
tannalute nathanre varadanannal anubhavikkunnavarayi. avar neratte sadvrttarayirunnuvallea
ninnalil tanneyumunt. ennittum ninnal ateannum kant manas'silakkunnillennea
akasattil ninnalkk upajivanamunt. ninnale takkit ceytukeantirikkunna siksayum
akasabhumikalute nathan saksi. ninnal sansariccukeantirikkunnu ennapeale it satyamakunnu
ibrahiminre adaraniyaraya atithikalute vivaram ninakk vannettiyea
avaraddehattinre atuttuvanna sandarbham? avaraddehattin salam parannu. addeham parannu: ninnalkkum salam; aparicitaranallea
anantaram addeham ativegam tanre vittukare samipiccu. annane kealutta pasukkitavine pakam ceytukeantuvannu
atavarute samipattuveccu. addeham ceadiccu: ninnal tinnunnille
appeal addehattin avarepparri asanka teanni. avar parannu: “petikkenta”. jnaniyaya oru putranre jananattekkuricca subhavartta avaraddehatte ariyiccu
appeal addehattinre bharya occavecc otivannu. svantam mukhattaticcukeant avar ceadiccu: "vandhyayaya i kilavikkea?”
avar ariyiccu: "ate, annane sambhavikkumenn ninre nathan ariyiccirikkunnu. avan yuktimanum abhijnanum tanne; tircca.”
addeham anvesiccu: allayea dutanmare, ninnalute yatreaddesyam entan
ava atikramikalkkayi ninre nathanre vasam pratyekam atayalappetuttiveccavayan.”
ennal namavite muslinkalutetayi oru vitallateannum kantilla
neaveriya siksaye petikkunnavarkk namavite oratayalam bakkiveccu
musayilum ninnalkk drstantamunt. vyaktamaya telivumayi nam addehatte pharaveanre atuttekkayacca sandarbham
avan tanre kalivil garv naticc pintirinnu. ennitt parannu: ivanearu mayajalakkaran; allenkil bhrantan
atinal avaneyum avanre pattalatteyum nam pitikuti. pinne avareyeakke katalilerinnu. avan akseparhan tanne
ad janatayute karyattilum ninnalkk drstantamunt. vandhyamaya karrine namavarkkunere ayacca sandarbham
thamudilum ninnalkk drstantamunt. “oru nirnita avadhi vare ninnal sukhiccu kealluka” enn avareata paranna sandarbham
ennittum avar tannalute nathanre kalpanaye dhikkariccu. annane avar neakkinilkke ghearamayearitinadam avare pitikuti
avarkku mumpe nuhinre janatayeyum nam nasippiccittunt. urappayum avarum adharmikarayirunnu
akasatte nam kaikalal nirmiccu. namatine vikasippiccukeantirikkukayan
bhumiye nam vitartti viriccirikkunnu. etra visistamayi vitanikkunnavan
nam ella vastukkalilninnum irant inakale srsticcu. ninnal cinticcariyan
atinal ninnal allahuvilekk otiyettuka. urappayum avanilninn ninnalilekkulla telinna takkitukaranan nan
allahuvineappam marrearu daivatteyum sthapikkatirikkuka. tirccayayum avanilninn ninnalkkulla vyaktamaya munnariyippu nalkunnavanan nan
ivvidham bhrantanennea mayajalakkaranennea aksepikkappetatta orearra daivadutanum ivarkk mumpullavarilum vannittilla
avareakkeyum annane ceyyan an'yean'yam parannurappiccirikkayanea? alla; avareakkeyum atikramikalaya janam tanne
atinal ni avarilninn pinmaruka. enkil ni akseparhanalla
ni udbeadhanam tutaruka. urappayum satyavisvasikalkk udbeadhanam upakarikkum
jinnukaleyum manusyareyum enikku valippettu jivikkanallate nan srsticcittilla
nan avarilninn upajivanameannum keatikkunnilla. avarenikk tinnan taranamennum nanagrahikkunnilla
allahuvan annadatav, tircca. avan atisaktanum karuttanum tanne
urappayum akramam pravarttikkunnavarkk siksayunt. avarute mungamikalaya kuttukarkk kittiya pealulla siksa. atinal avarenneatatinu titukkam kuttentatilla
satyanisedhikaleat takkit nalkikkeantirikkunna dinamille; atavarkk sarvanasattinretutanne
niscayam, ninre nathanre siksa sambhavikkuka tanne ceyyum
alla; it mayajalamanea? atalla, ninnal kanunnillennuntea

ini ninnalatil kitannu venteriyuka. ninnalit sahikkukayea sahikkatirikkukayea ceyyuka. rantum ninnalkku samam tanne. ninnal pravartticcukeantirunnatin anuyeajyamaya pratiphalam tanneyan ninnalkku nalkunnat.”
tannalute nathan avarkkekiyatil anandam anubhavikkunnavarayi. kattikkalunna narakattiyilninn avarute nathan avare katturaksikkum
ann avareat parayum: ninnal pravartticcukeantirunnatinre pratiphalamayi ninnal anandatteate tinnukayum kutikkukayum ceyyuka
varivariyayi nirattiyitta kattilukalil cariyirikkunnavarayirikkum avar. visalaksikalaya tarunikale nam avarkk inakalayikkeatukkum

satyavisvasam svikariccavareyum satyavisvasa svikaranattil avare anugamicca avarute santanannaleyum nam orumiccu cerkkum. avarute karmaphalannalil namearu kuravum varuttukayilla. orea manusyanum tan sampadiccatin arhanayirikkum
avaragrahikkunna etinam palavum mansavum namavarkk nirleabham nalkum
avar panapatram parasparam kaimarikkeantirikkum. asabhyavakkea durvrttiyea avite untavukayilla
avarute paricaranattinayi avarute atutt balanmar currikkarannikkeantirikkum. kattusuksikkum muttukalpealirikkum avar
avar parayum: "niscayamayum nam itin mump nam'mute kutumbattilayirunnappeal asankakularayirunnu
atinal allahu nam'me anugrahiccu. cuttupeallunna naraka siksayilninn avan nam'me raksiccu
niscayamayum nam mumpe avaneat matraman prarthikkaruntayirunnat. avan tanneyan atyudaranum dayaparanum; tircca.”
atinal ni udbeadhanam tutarnnukeantirikkuka. ninre nathanre anugrahattal ni jyeatsyanea bhrantanea alla
“iyal oru kaviyan. iyalute karyattil kalavipatt varunnat namukku kattirunnu kanam” ennanea avar parayunnat
enkil ni parayuka: sari, ninnal kattirikkuka; ninnaleateappam kattirikkunnavaril nanumunt
ivarute bud'dhi ivareat ivvidham parayan ajnapikkukayanea? atea; ivar atikramikalaya janata tanneyea
alla; i khur'an addeham svayam ketticcamaccuntakkiyatanennanea ivarareapikkunnat? ennal ivar visvasikkunnillennatan satyam
atalla; srastavillate svayam untayavaranea ivar? atea ivar tanneyanea ivarute srastakkal
allenkil ivaranea akasa bhumikale srsticcat? ennal ivar drdhamayi visvasikkunnillennatan satyam
atalla; ninre nathanre khajanavukal ivarute vasamanea? allenkil ivaranea ateakkeyum niyantriccu natattunnat
atalla; vivarannal kettariyanayi uparileakattekk kayaranivarkk valla keaniyumuntea? enkil avvidham kettu manas'silakkunnavar atin vyaktamaya valla telivum keantuvaratte
atalla; ni ivareat entenkilum pratiphalam avasyappetunnuntea? annane atinre katabharattal prayasappetukayanea ivar
atalla; ivarkk abhetikajnanam labhikkukayum annane ivarateluti vekkukayum ceytittuntea
atalla; ivar valla kutantravum kanikkan uddesikkunnuvea? enkil satyanisedhikalarea, avar tanneyayirikkum kutantrattinnirayakunnavar
atalla; ivarkk allahuvallate marru valla daivavumuntea? ivar pankucerkkunnatil ninnellam allahu etrayea parisud'dhanan
akasattinre oratal tanne atarnn vilunnat kantalum at meghamalayanennayirikkum ivar parayuka
atinal ivare vittekkuka. beadharahitarayi vilunna durdinatteyivar kantumuttum vare
ivarute kutantrannaleannum ivarkkeattum upakarikkatta dinam. ivarkk ann oru sahayavum labhikkukayilla
tirccayayum akramam pravartticcavarkk atallatta siksayumunt; urapp. enkilum ivarilere perum atariyunnilla
atinal ninre nathanre tirumanatte ksamayeate kattirikkuka. ni nam'mute kanpatil tanneyan. ni unarnnelunnelkkumpeal ninre nathane kirttikkunnateateappam avanre visud'dhiye valttukayum ceyyuka
iravilum avanre visud'dhiye valttuka; tarakannal pinvannumpealum
i sandesam addehattinu nalkappetta divya beadhanam matraman
prabalanaya oru vyakti. annane avan nivarnnuninnu
annane rantu villealamea atil kututalea atutt nilakeantu
appeal, allahu tanre dasan nalkenta sandesam avan beadhanamayi nalki
ennittum a pravacakan neril kantatinekkuricc ninnal addehatteat tarkkikkukayanea
marrearu irannivaravu velayilum addeham jibriline kantittunt
anneram sidraye avaranam ceyyunna atigambhiramaya prabhavam atine avaranam ceyyunnuntayirunnu
appeal pravacakanre drsti terrippeayilla. paridhi langhiccumilla
urappayum addeham tanre nathanre mahattaya cila drstantannal kantittunt
enkil it tirttum niti rahitamaya vibhajanam tanne

yatharthattil ava, ninnalum ninnalute purva pitakkalum vilicca cila perukalallateannumalla. allahu ivaykkeannum oru telivum nalkiyittilla. uhatteyum dehechayeyum matraman avar pinparrunnat. niscayam, avarkk tannalute nathanil ninnulla nervali vannettiyittunt
ennal ariyuka: i leakavum paraleakavum allahuvinretan
manatt etra malakkukalunt! avarute suparsakaleannum ottum upakarikkukayilla. allahu ichikkukayum istappetukayum ceyyunnavarkk avan anumati nalkiya sesamallate
avarkk atekkuricc orarivumilla. avar uhatte matram pinparrukayan. uhamea, satyattin oru prayeajanavum ceyyukayilla
atinal nam'me orkkunnatil ninn pintiriyukayum aihika jivitasukhattinappurameannum laksyamakkatirikkukayum ceyyunnavare avarute pattin vituka
avarkku netanaya ariv atumatraman. tanre margattilninn terriyavar arenn erram nannayariyunnavan ninre nathanan. nervali prapiccavarepparri nannayariyunnavanum avan tanne
akasa bhumikalilullateakkeyum allahuvinretan. durvrttarkk avarute pravarttanannalkkeatta pratiphalam nalkananat. sadvrttarkk sadphalam sam'manikkanum

avarea, van papannalum nicavrttikalum varjikkunnavaran. keaccu vilcakalealike. niscayamayum ninre nathan udaramayi pearukkunnavanan. ninnale bhumiyil ninn srsticcuntakkiyappealum ninnal ninnalute matakkalute garbhasayattil bhrunamayirunnappealum ninnalepparri nannayariyunnavan avan tanne. atinal ninnal svayam visud'dhi camayatirikkuka. yathartha bhaktanarenn nannayariyunnavan avan matraman
ennal satyattil ninn pintirinnavane ni kantea
avanre vasam valla abhetika jnanavumuntea? annane avanat kantukeantirikkukayanea
atalla; musayute etukalilullavayepparri avan ariv labhiccittille
atentennal papabharam cumakkunna arum aparanre papaccumat perukayilla
peranika ad vargatte nasippiccatum avan tanne
atinu mumpe nuhinre janatayeyum avan nasippiccu. karanam, avar katutta akramikalum dhikkarikalumayirunnu
kilmel marinna natineyum avan takarttu tarippanamakki
ennittum ninre nathanre anugrahannalil etineyan ni sansayikkunnat
i pravacakan mumpulla takkitukarute kuttattilpetta munnariyippukaran tanne
varanirikkunna a sambhavam athava leakavasanam ita atuttettiyirikkunnu
ennittum i vacanatte sambandhicc ninnal vismayam kurukayanea
atinal allahuvin sastangam pranamikkuka. avan matram valippetukayum ceyyuka
ennal etu drstantam kantalum avaratine avaganikkunnu. tutarnnu pearunna mayajalamenn parayukayum ceyyunnu
avaratine tallipparannu. svechakale pinparri. ennal ella karyannalum oru paryavasanattilettuka tanne ceyyum
tirccayayum avarkku neratte cila vivarannal vannettiyittunt. durmargattil ninn tatannunirttunna takkitukal atilunt
atinal avare vittakaluka. atibhikaramaya oru karyattilekk avare vilikkunna dinam
peticcaranta kannukaleate avar tannalute khabarukalilninn purattuvarum. parannu parakkunna vettukilikaleppeale
viliyalanre atuttekk avar pannettum. ann satyanisedhikal vilapikkum: “itearu durdinam tanne.”
ivarkkumump nuhinre janatayum ivvidham satyatte nisedhiccittunt. annane avar nam'mute dasane tallipparannu. bhrantanenn viliccu. virattiyeatikkukayum ceytu
appealaddeham tanre nathane viliccu prarthiccu: "nan tearririkkunnu. atinal niyenne sahayikkename.”
annane kearicceariyunna pemariyal nam vanakavatannal turannu
bhumiye pilartti aruvikal peattiyealukki. annane, niscayikkappetta karyam natakkanayi i vellameakkeyum sangamiccu
nuhine nam palakakalum kilannalumulla kappalil kayarri
at nam'mute melneattattilan ninniyirunnat. janam nisedhiccu talliyavannulla pratiphalamanat
urappayum namatine oru telivayi bakki veccittunt. atinal cinticc pathamulkkeallunna arenkilumuntea
appeal enre siksayum takkitum evvidhamayirunnuvenn ariyuka
i khur'anine nam cinticcariyanayi lalitamakkiyirikkunnu. atinal aleaciccariyunna arenkilumuntea
ad samudayam satyatte nisedhiccu. appeal enre siksayum takkitum evvidhamayirunnuvennea
avarute nere nam cirriyatikkunna karrine ayaccu; vittealiyatta dussakunattinre nalil
at a janatte pilutumarrikkeantirunnu. katapulakivina ittappanattatipeale
cinticcu manas'silakkanayi i khur'anine nam lalitamakkiyirikkunnu. aleaciccu manas'silakkunna arenkilumuntea
annane avar ceadiccu: "nam'mute kuttattile oru manusyane nam pintutarukayea? enkil nam valiketilum bud'dhisun'yatayilum akappettatutanne
namukkitayilninn ivan matram udbeadhanam nalkappettuvennea? illa; ivan ahankariyaya perunkallanan.”
ennal nale avarariyukatanne ceyyum. aran ahankariyaya perunkallanenn
avarkk oru pariksanamenna nilayil nam oreattakatte ayakkukayan. atinal ni avare niriksiccukeantirikkuka. ksamayavalambikkuka
avare ariyikkuka: kutivellam avarkkum ottakattinumitayil pankuvekkappettirikkunnu. orearuttarum tannalute ulamanusaricce vellattin varavu
avasanam avar tannalute kuttukarane viliccu- avan akkaryam erretuttu. annane avan ottakatte kasappu ceytu
nam avarutemel oru ghearagarjanamayaccu. appealavar kalittealuttile kaccitturumpukal pealeyayi
cinticcariyanayi nam i khur'anine lalitamakkiyirikkunnu. ennal cinticcu manas'silakkunnavarayi arenkilumuntea
nam avarute nere caralkkarrayaccu. lutvinre kutumbame atil ninnealivayullu. ravinre otuvuvelayil namavare raksappetutti
nam'mil ninnulla anugrahamayirunnu at. avvidhaman nandi kanikkunnavarkk nam pratiphalamekunnat
nam'mute siksaye sambandhicc lutv avarkk munnariyipp nalkiyittuntayirunnu. ennal avar takkitukale sansayicc tallukayayirunnu
avar addehatteat tanre atithikale avarute ichapuranattin vittukeatukkanavasyappettu. appeal nam avarute kannukale tutaccumayiccu. enre siksayum takkitum asvadiccukealluka
cinticcu manas'silakkanayi nam i khur'anine lalitamakkiyirikkunnu. aleaciccariyunnavarayi arenkilumuntea
avar nam'mute drstantannaleyeakke kallamakki talli. appeal nam avare pitikuti. pratapiyum prabalanumaya oruttanre pitikutalpeale
ninnalute i nisedhikal avarekkal meccamanea? atallenkil vedattalukalil ninnalute papamuktikku valla upayannalumuntea
atalla; tannal sanghatitaranennum svayam raksaprapiccukeallamennum avaravakasappetunnuvea
enkil atuttutanne i sangham parajitaravum, pintirinneatukayum ceyyum
ennal a antyanalan avarute kanakk tirppinulla niscitasamayam. a antyasamayam atyantam bhikaravum tiktavum tanne
tirccayayum i kurravalikal vyaktamaya valiketilakunnu. tikanna bud'dhisun'yatayilum
ivare mukham nilattukuttiyavarayi narakattilekk valiccilakkunna dinam; ann avareat parayum: ninnal narakasparsam asvadiccukealluka
nam'mute kalpana orearra uttaravatre. imavettumpealekkum atu natappavunnu
niscayamayum ninnale pealulla pala kaksikaleyum nam nasippiccittunt. atinal aleaciccariyunna arenkilumuntea
avan manatte uyartti nirtti. tulas sthapiccu
atinal nitipurvam krtyatayeate tulas upayeagikkuka. tukkattil kuravu varuttarut
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
mankutam peale muttiyal mulannunna kalimannilninn avan manusyane srsticcu
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
rant udayasthanannaluteyum rant astamayasthanannaluteyum nathan avanatre
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre et anugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
avan rant samudrannale parasparam sangamikkan sadhikkumar ayaccuvittirikkunnu
ava rantinumitayil oru nireadhapatalamunt. ava parasparam atikramiccukatakkukayilla
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
samudrattil sancarikkunna, parvatannalpeale uyaramulla kappalukal avanretan
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
mahanum gambhiranumaya ninre nathanre astitvam matraman avasesikkuka
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
akasabhumikalilullavayeakkeyum tannalute avasyannal avaneat ceadiccukeantirikkunnu. atinal avanennum karyanirvahanattilan
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
bhumikk bharamaya jinnukale, manusyare, ninnalute vicaranakkayi nam olinnu varunnunt
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
jinnukaluteyum manusyaruteyum samuhame, akasabhumikalute atirukal bhedicc purattu peakanakumenkil ninnal purattupeavuka. ninnalkk purattukatakkanavilla. oru mahasaktiyute pinbalamillate
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
ninnalirukuttaruteyum nere tiksnamaya tijjvalakalum pukapatalannalum ayakkum. ninnalkkavaye atijayikkanavilla
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
akasam peattippilarnn reasappu niramullatum kulampupealullatum ayittirumpealulla avastha entayirikkum
appeal ninnaliruvibhagattinreyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
anne dinam manusyaneatea jinnineatea avarute papamentenn ceadiccariyentatillattavidhamat vyaktamayirikkum
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
kurravalikale avarute laksanannal keantutanne tiriccariyunnatan. avare kutumayilum padannalilum piticc valiccilakkum
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
tanre nathanre sannidhiyil tanne keantuvarumenn bhayannavan rant svargiyaramannalunt
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre et anugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum nathanre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
appeal ninnalirukuttaruteyum raksitavinre etanugrahatteyan ninnal tallipparayuka
